title.rendered: Global Accelerated Uploading for Jumpshare Business

content.rendered:
Last year, we deployed a global CDN network for all Jumpshare users to help them deliver their work and ideas faster. Our users tell us it has made a massive difference in sharing experience due to faster online preview and downloads, no matter where in the world the files are accessed from.

Today, as teams around the world work remotely from their homes due to the COVID-19 crisis, the need for global accelerated uploading is more important than ever.

We’re excited to announce the availability of global accelerated uploading for teams on the Jumpshare Business plan starting today. There is no action required from your end. The global accelerated uploading is enabled by default for all Jumpshare Business accounts.

For those who’re not aware of how it works – the global accelerated uploading utilizes the same servers and networks around the world that are used to deliver files via CDN (Content Delivery Network). For example, if you’re in Europe and you upload some files to Jumpshare, instead of uploading them to our servers in the US, the files will be uploaded to the European servers, thus speeding up the time it takes to upload them.

Sign up for our Jumpshare Business plan 14-days free trial starting today!
